enabled.description: Enable the handler if set to true so that it will be wired in the handler chain during the startup.

bypass.description: Bypass the current chaos monkey middleware handler so that attacks won't be triggered.

level.description: How many requests are to be attacked. 1 each request, 5 each 5th request is attacked.

latencyRangeStart.description: Dynamic Latency range start in milliseconds. When start and end are equal, then fixed latency.

latencyRangeEnd.description: Dynamic latency range end in milliseconds.
